interestingcomments.content:
Don't make GDPR requests to Reddit. They ban you. /!/ I'm going to make a plea to the reddit admins to have my account undeleted, but if they say no - then that's it. Thanks /u/[james\_son\_of\_james](https://old.reddit.com/user/james_son_of_james) for the email to let me know it happened, and thanks /u/milleniador for the memorial wall.

And funny you should ask about an archive, /u/[no-tenemos-triko-tri](https://old.reddit.com/user/no-tenemos-triko-tri) \- as that is literally all I asked the admins for, which is apparently what got my account deleted.
